channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says he’ll sign executive order to lower prescription-drug prices
item.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday said he will sign an executive order to slash prescription-drug prices.

item.title: MCP and the innovation paradox: Why open standards will save AI from itself
